Quote: "dowload finished but deamon tools isnt reading the CDs as existing. anyone wanna help? also, please try to simplify your explaination, im not a huge techy"

Hi. I also struggled with this one. I found tho if u use a program called burnatonce (google it) you can burn the images successfully. Also if the .toc and .dat files are in the same location it will update the .toc file automatically. Simply click n burn.

This is the RTS (real time strategy) version ;c... Does any one know where can i find the FPS (first person shooter) version?

Ok, Did some research found out two things...

This is the game developed by "Rage Software Limited" (the real time strategy version) released in late 1998...

The third person shooter version is developed by "Pixelogic" nearly at the same year (1999)...
(see http://www.pixelogic.nildram.co.uk/pages/wotw.htm)

Hope i made my interpretation clear?  But if you want to correct me, that would be great, that's more knowledge to be given to Wikipedia...

can someone plz plz plz help me. i have downloaded it- each disk has 1 .dat and .toc file.
how do i get these to play?? ive tried everything i can think of and they dont work. plz some one help i wanna play this so bad!!!
I don't understand, what do you mean by "modify *.toc files to correspond with your file address"? How do I do it?

This game works fine on Windows 7 without any alteration. To install the game, just mount the DAT file using daemon tools - when browsing for the file in DT, change the extension from the default to *.* so it can see it.

The game played straight away, but without in-game music, which can be fixed by downloading the patch.
Does this work ok with Win 7 64bit?
